1. Compute config.e

```
> python3 parse_public_key.py
Modulus (n): 
Public exponent (e): 65537
```

2. Crack Linear Congruential Generators (LCG)

By using the tool [LCGHack](https://github.com/TomasGlgg/LCGHack) with the 6 consecutive numbers in dump.txt

```
> python3 lcg_hack.py -k 2166771675595184069339107365908377157701164485820981409993925279512199123418374034275465590004848135946671454084220731645099286746251308323653144363063385 6729272950467625456298454678219613090467254824679318993052294587570153424935267364971827277137521929202783621553421958533761123653824135472378133765236115 2230396903302352921484704122705539403201050490164649102182798059926343096511158288867301614648471516723052092761312105117735046752506523136197227936190287 4578847787736143756850823407168519112175260092601476810539830792656568747136604250146858111418705054138266193348169239751046779010474924367072989895377792 7578332979479086546637469036948482551151240099803812235949997147892871097982293017256475189504447955147399405791875395450814297264039908361472603256921612 2550420443270381003007873520763042837493244197616666667768397146110589301602119884836605418664463550865399026934848289084292975494312467018767881691302197
Modulus: 8311271273016946265169120092240227882013893131681882078655426814178920681968884651437107918874328518499850252591810409558783335118823692585959490215446923
Multiplier: 99470802153294399618017402366955844921383026244330401927153381788409087864090915476376417542092444282980114205684938728578475547514901286372129860608477
Increment: 3910539794193409979886870049869456815685040868312878537393070815966881265118275755165613835833103526090552456472867019296386475520134783987251699999776365
```

3. Capture the flag

```
> python3 solution.py
[+] Public Key:  
[+] size:  4090 bits
flag: b'CTF{C0nGr@tz_RiV35t_5h4MiR_nD_Ad13MaN_W0ulD_b_h@pPy}'
```
